alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 16 at 12:40AM EST until January 16 at 1:45AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM EST FOR WAKULLA AND NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 1240 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Crawfordville to 10 miles southeast of Carrabelle, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... St. Marks, Crawfordville, Woodville, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Newport, Shadeville, Wakulla Springs, Panacea, Medart, Buckhorn, Bethel, Liveoak Island, Curtis Mill, Alligator Point, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Bald Point, Hyde Park and Panacea-Wakulla Airport. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
